validate-code.message: Please use only letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscore(_) in this field, first character should be a letter.

validate-code-event.message: Please do not use "event" for an attribute code.

validate-email-sender.message: Please use only visible characters and spaces.

validate-admin-password.message: Please enter more characters. Password should contain both numeric and alphabetic characters.

validate-identifier.message: Please enter a valid URL Key. For example "example-page", "example-page.html" or "anotherlevel/example-page".

validate-xml-identifier.message: Please enter a valid XML-identifier. For example something_1, block5, id-4.

validate-data.message: Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z), numbers (0-9) or underscore(_) in this field, first character should be a letter.

validate-css-length.message: Please input a valid CSS-length. For example 100px or 77pt or 20em or .5ex or 50%.

validate-special-price.message: The Special Price is active only when lower than the Actual Price.

confirm-current-password.message: Enter current password and press "Save Account" to confirm passkey change.

passkey-registered.message: Passkey will be registered upon saving.

passkey-deleted.message: Passkey will be deleted upon saving.

submit-order-unsaved-items.message: You have unsaved item changes. Discard and proceed with checkout?

clear-giftmessage.message: First, clean the Message field in Gift Message form

delete-folder-message.message: Are you sure you want to delete current folder?

delete-file-message.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected file?
